thread.title: Trump picks Patriots over Falcons for Super Bowl win
thread.title_full: Trump picks Patriots over Falcons for Super Bowl win

title: Trump picks Patriots over Falcons for Super Bowl win
text: Posted: 5:48 p.m. Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017 Trump picks Patriots over Falcons for Super Bowl win Related View Larger Getty Images President Donald Trump is apparently mandating a dress code for his female staffer, telling them to 'dress like women.' Latest Headlines > More The Atlanta Journal-Constitution President Donald Trump has made his pick for the Super Bowl , and he believes the New England Patriots will defeat the Atlanta Falcons Sunday in Houston. Speaking with Fox’s Bill O’Reilly from the White House, Trump thinks the AFC champions will prevail in Super Bowl LI. When pressed by O’Reilly to give a prediction, he replied: “I think the Patriots will win. They’ll win by eight points.”
